name: amharic-hnet-qwin
description: Amharic H-Net with Playwright MCP integration

scripts.collect:test: node -e "const Collector = require('./mega_article_collector.js'); const c = new Collector(); c.maxArticles = 50; c.run();"

scripts.pipeline:test: npm run collect:test && npm run process
